title: Team Resources
description: Valuable resources to support your development as a lacrosse player.
content:
Team Resources

Here are some valuable resources to support your development:

Online Training

  • US Lacrosse - Official governing body
  • Lacrosse Film Room - Game analysis and strategy

Equipment

  • Make sure your stick is properly strung
  • Check your helmet fit regularly
  • Replace worn-out cleats

Contact

Questions? Reach out to your coaches or team administrators.

title: Training Videos
description: Access curated video content to improve your skills and understanding of the game.
content:
Training Videos

Watch and learn from expert instruction and game footage.

Skill Development

  • Stick handling fundamentals
  • Shooting techniques and accuracy
  • Defensive positioning and footwork
  • Face-off strategies

Game Analysis

  • Breaking down professional games
  • Understanding offensive and defensive schemes
  • Learning from the best players in the game

Strength and Conditioning

  • Lacrosse-specific workouts
  • Injury prevention exercises
  • Recovery and mobility work
